docs.snippet: David West scored 24 points and Andrew Bynum had a season-high 10 rebounds in his Pacers debut, helping Indiana to a 94-83 victory against visiting Boston....

docs.abstract: Indiana Pacers beat Boston Celtics, 94-83, ending four-game losing streak; other basketball news noted.

docs.snippet: If Phil Jackson agrees to guide the Knicks’ personnel decisions, he won’t be dealing with an easy fixer-upper....
docs.lead_paragraph: If Phil Jackson agrees to guide the Knicks’ personnel decisions, he won’t be dealing with an easy fixer-upper.
docs.abstract: Analysis; Phil Jackson will face an uphill battle should he choose to join the New York Knicks' front office and guide their personnel decisions; will face difficult market for Amar'e Stoudemire and Andrea Bargnani, who are still owed significant money, and would not gain true team-building flexibility until summer of 2015.

headline.main: If Jackson Joins the Knicks, His Options at the Beginning Are Few

docs.snippet: After a drastic realignment and a season of change under Commissioner Val Ackerman, the conference headed into its tournament that begins Wednesday at Madison Square Garden....
docs.lead_paragraph: After a drastic realignment and a season of change under Commissioner Val Ackerman, the conference headed into its tournament that begins Wednesday at Madison Square Garden.
docs.abstract: Big East NCAA conference, following year of drastic realignment, is still being polished on the eve of the Big East tournament; commissioner Val Ackerman, who had to start from square one after departure of seven Catholic universities, has been setting up offices, lining up sponsors and spearheading new advertising campaign.

headline.main: The New Big East: In Spartan Offices, an Ornate Vision
